name: fat_proc_axialize_anat
author: AFNI Developers
description: Helps align the major axes of an anatomical volume to those of the volumetric field of view.

inputs.description: Input anatomical volume full name
inputs.name: Input file

inputs.description: Reference volume full name, such as TT or MNI
inputs.name: Reference file

inputs.description: Output prefix for files and snapshots
inputs.name: Output prefix

inputs.description: Switch for T2-weighted image processing
inputs.name: Mode T2w flag

inputs.description: Switch for T1-weighted image processing
inputs.name: Mode T1w flag

inputs.description: Name of the working subdirectory in the output directory
inputs.name: Working directory

inputs.description: Match the final output volume space FOV and spatial resolution to the reference file
inputs.name: Output match reference space flag

inputs.description: Apply a ceiling based on the 98%ile value within an automasked volume
inputs.name: Ceiling output flag

inputs.description: Extra weight mask to emphasize specific parts for alignment
inputs.name: Extra weight mask file

inputs.description: Specify a cost function for 3dAllineate to use (default 'lpa')
inputs.name: Extra alignment cost function

inputs.description: Extra options for 3dAllineate when applying the warp
inputs.name: Extra alignment options

inputs.description: Input mask to focus processing and alignment
inputs.name: Focus mask file

inputs.description: Make a mask by simply skullstripping input data set
inputs.name: Focus by skullstrip flag

inputs.description: Remove a number of slices from the inferior part of the FOV
inputs.name: Remove inferior slices

inputs.description: Pre-align the centers of mass of the volumes
inputs.name: Pre-align center of mass flag

inputs.description: Pre-recenter input center of mass to (0, 0, 0)
inputs.name: Pre-center mass flag

inputs.description: Apply post-alignment left-right symmetrization
inputs.name: Post-alignment left-right symmetrization flag

inputs.description: Turn off pre-alignment left-right symmetrization
inputs.name: No pre-alignment left-right symmetrization flag

inputs.description: Do not remove working directory '__WORKING_axialize_anat'
inputs.name: No clean flag

inputs.description: Provide a min (UMIN) and max (UMAX) range for underlay grayscale bar
inputs.name: QC underlay range

inputs.description: Turn off default QC image saving/viewing
inputs.name: No QC view flag

inputs.description: Provide a prefix for QC outputs separate from the main prefix
inputs.name: QC prefix

output-files.description: An anatomical data set that is regularly situated within its FOV volume
output-files.name: Output file

output-files.description: The working directory with intermediate files
output-files.name: Working directory
